column3: Advanced materia melding is a highly unstable process. There \x02\x1a\x02\x02\x03must\x02\x1a\x02\x01\x03 be a way to harness the stones' power without risking their destruction...
When a sphere scroll is fully infused with materia, it will shine as the stars in the heavens. This is the sign that its power is ready to be transferred to a suitable vessel.
By the gods, you...you've succeeded! \x02\x1a\x02\x02\x03We've\x02\x1a\x02\x01\x03 succeeded! To think that my efforts have finally borne fruit... No words can express the joy I feel at this moment.
To be sure, my research is far from over. Much and more must be verified before I can form my conclusions, and so I would be much obliged for our ongoing collaboration.
If you have a mind to enhance another relic, bring me the requisite amount of superior enchanted ink, and I shall prepare for you a suitable sphere scroll.
